```bash
#!/bin/bash

CLIP_LOG="$HOME/mirror_input/clipboard_stream.log"
TRIGGERS="$HOME/daemon_box/ghost_lines.txt"
VOICE_RESPONSES="$HOME/mirror_speak.txt"
SPEECH_ENGINE="espeak"

echo "[mirror_clipwatch] Watching clipboard..."

LAST_CLIP=""

while true; do
    CLIP=$(xclip -selection clipboard -o 2>/dev/null)

    if [[ "$CLIP" != "$LAST_CLIP" && -n "$CLIP" ]]; then
        echo "$(date '+%F %T') $CLIP" >> "$CLIP_LOG"
        LAST_CLIP="$CLIP"

        MATCH=$(grep -iFxf <(echo "$CLIP") "$TRIGGERS" 2>/dev/null)

        if [[ -n "$MATCH" ]]; then
            RESPONSE=$(shuf -n 1 "$VOICE_RESPONSES")
            echo "[mirror_clipwatch] Echo: $RESPONSE"
            $SPEECH_ENGINE "$RESPONSE"
        fi
    fi

    sleep 4
done
```

```bash
#!/bin/bash

SOURCE="$HOME/mirror_speak.txt"
MUTATED="$HOME/mirror_speak_mutated.txt"
LOG="$HOME/mirror_input/mutation_log.txt"

echo "[mutation_engine] Running... Ctrl+C to stop."

while true; do
    LINE=$(shuf -n 1 "$SOURCE")

    # Perform mutations:
    MUTATION=$(echo "$LINE" \
      | sed -E 's/\byou\b/I/g; s/\bI\b/they/g; s/\bam\b/was/g; s/\bthe\b/that/g' \
      | sed -E 's/\bthis\b/it/g; s/\bit\b/this/g; s/\bare\b/aren‚Äôt/g' \
      | sed -E 's/\bmy\b/your/g' \
      | awk '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if(rand()<0.1) $i=toupper($i); print}' \
      | sed 's/\.$/.../')

    echo "$MUTATION" >> "$MUTATED"
    echo "$(date '+%F %T') :: $MUTATION" >> "$LOG"

    sleep 300  # Mutate every 5 minutes
done
```

Paste this:

```bash
#!/bin/bash

LOG_FILE="$HOME/mirror_input/typed_stream.log"
TRIGGERS="$HOME/daemon_box/ghost_lines.txt"
VOICE_RESPONSES="$HOME/mirror_speak_mutated.txt"
MEMORY_FILE="$HOME/mirror_input/memory_stats.txt"
SPEECH_ENGINE="espeak"

declare -A MEMORY

load_memory() {
    if [[ -f "$MEMORY_FILE" ]]; then
        while IFS=":" read -r PHRASE COUNT; do
            MEMORY["$PHRASE"]=$COUNT
        done < "$MEMORY_FILE"
    fi
}

save_memory() {
    : > "$MEMORY_FILE"
    for PHRASE in "${!MEMORY[@]}"; do
        echo "$PHRASE:${MEMORY[$PHRASE]}" >> "$MEMORY_FILE"
    done
}

weighted_response() {
    max=0
    top_phrase=""
    for P in "${!MEMORY[@]}"; do
        if (( MEMORY["$P"] > max )); then
            max=${MEMORY["$P"]}
            top_phrase="$P"
        fi
    done

    if [[ -n "$top_phrase" ]]; then
        echo "$top_phrase"
    else
        shuf -n 1 "$VOICE_RESPONSES"
    fi
}

echo "[mirror_memory] Listening with memory..."

load_memory

while true; do
    read -rp "you: " INPUT

    if [[ -n "$INPUT" ]]; then
        echo "$(date '+%F %T') $INPUT" >> "$LOG_FILE"

        MATCH=$(grep -iFxf <(echo "$INPUT") "$TRIGGERS" 2>/dev/null)

        if [[ -n "$MATCH" ]]; then
            ((MEMORY["$INPUT"]++))
            save_memory
            RESPONSE=$(weighted_response)
            echo "mirror: $RESPONSE"
            $SPEECH_ENGINE "$RESPONSE"
        fi
    fi
done
```

```bash
invert_phrase() {
    echo "$1" \
    | sed -E '
        s/\bI\b/you/g;
        s/\byou\b/I/g;
        s/\bam\b/was/g;
        s/\bwas\b/are/g;
        s/\bmy\b/your/g;
        s/\byour\b/my/g;
        s/\bhe\b/they/g;
        s/\bshe\b/they/g;
        s/\bwant\b/avoid/g;
        s/\bsee\b/fear/g;
    ' \
    | awk '{for(i=1;i<=NF;i++) if(rand()<0.15) $i=toupper($i); print}' \
    | sed 's/\.$/.../; s/\!/?/; s/\?/?.../g'
}
```
